summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5867 for the improvement of 17th Avenue Southwest, from West Marginal Place to approximately 300 feet south of West Andover Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 77283, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
